title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 32 of 2022), and with the consent of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electricity Costs Emergency
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electricity Costs Emergency 

Benefit Scheme II Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited electricity cost emergency benefit scheme ii regulation 2022

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 32 of 2022), and with the consent of
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Act of 2022” means the Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity Accounts) 
Emergency Measures and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 32 of 
2022); 

“first payment period” means the payment period commencing on 1 November 
2022 and ending on 31 December 2022; 

“second payment period” means the payment period commencing on 1 January 
2023 and ending on 28 February 2023; 

“third payment period” means the payment period commencing on 1 March 
2023 and ending on 30 April 2023.
text_norm: 2 regulation - act 2022 mean electricity cost (domestic electricity accounts) emergency measure miscellaneous provision act 2022 (no 32 2022) first payment period mean payment period commencing 1 november 2022 ending 31 december 2022 second payment period mean payment period commencing 1 january 2023 ending 28 february 2023 third payment period mean payment period commencing 1 march 2023 ending 30 april 2023

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 32 of 2022), and with the consent of
heading: 3. 20 October 2022 is prescribed as the relevant date for the purposes of
text_raw:
3. 20 October 2022 is prescribed as the relevant date for the purposes of 

section 4(1)(a) of the Act of 2022.
text_norm: 3 20 october 2022 prescribed relevant date purpose section 4(1)(a) act 2022

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 32 of 2022), and with the consent of
heading: 4. The following dates are prescribed for the purposes of section 4(1)(e) of
text_raw:
4. The following dates are prescribed for the purposes of section 4(1)(e) of 

the Act of 2022: 

(a) 

in respect of the first payment period, 27 October 2022; 

(b) 

in respect of the second payment period, 20 December 2022; 

(c) 

in respect of the third payment period, 27 February 2023. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [521] 3

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 32 of 2022), and with the consent of
heading: 5. The following periods are prescribed for the purposes of section 4(1)(f)
text_raw:
5. The following periods are prescribed for the purposes of section 4(1)(f) 

of the Act of 2022: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

in respect of the first payment period, the period commencing on 
27 October 2022 and ending on 30 November 2022; 

in respect of the second payment period, the period commencing 
on 20 December 2022 and ending on 31 January 2023; 

in respect of the third payment period, the period commencing 
on 27 February 2023 and ending on 31 March 2023.

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 32 of 2022), and with the consent of
heading: 6. The following periods are prescribed for the purposes of section 5(2) of
text_raw:
6. The following periods are prescribed for the purposes of section 5(2) of 

the Act of 2022: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

in respect of the first payment period, the period commencing on 
1 November 2022 and ending on 31 December 2022; 

in respect of the second payment period, the period commencing 
on 1 January 2023 to 28 February 2023; 

in respect of the third payment period, the period commencing 
on 1 March 2023 to 30 April 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [521] 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 October, 2022. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 October, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications.
